title: Apple Announces More Than 600 Apps Optimized for Vision Pro
content:
Apple today announced that over 600 apps with native support for visionOS will be available on the Vision Pro at launch.


Apps optimized for the Vision Pro include Disney+, Fantastical, CARROT Weather, and many others.

In addition, more than one million compatible iPad and iPhone apps will be available on the Vision Pro.

Vision Pro launches in the U.S. this Friday.

More details to follow.
